remarks: Value of the univariate polynomial evaluation map.  (Contributed by AV, 10-Sep-2019.)
statement:
evls1fval.q $e |- Q = ( S evalSub1 R ) $.
evls1fval.e $e |- E = ( 1o evalSub S ) $.
evls1fval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
evls1val.m $e |- M = ( 1o mPoly ( S |`s R ) ) $.
evls1val.k $e |- K = ( Base ` M ) $.
evls1val $p |- ( ( S e. CRing /\ R e. ( SubRing ` S ) /\ A e. K ) -> ( Q ` A ) = ( ( ( E ` R ) ` A ) o. ( y e. B |-> ( 1o X. { y } ) ) ) ) $.
$d B y $.
